briefTitle: A Study to Compare the Effect of SB3 and Herceptin® in Women With HER2 Positive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Phase III Randomised, Double-Blind, Parallel Group, Multicentre Study to Compare the Efficacy, Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Immunogenicity Between SB3 (Proposed Trastuzumab Biosimilar) and Herceptin® in Women With Newly Diagnosed HER2 Positive Early or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer in Neoadjuvant Setting
conditions: HER2 Positive Early or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer
summary: A Phase III Randomised, Double-Blind, Parallel Group, Multicentre Study to Compare the Efficacy, Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Immunogenicity between SB3 (proposed trastuzumab biosimilar) and Herceptin® in Women with Newly Diagnosed HER2 Positive Early or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer in Neoadjuvant Setting

primaryOutcome.measure: The Pathologic Complete Response (pCR) Rate of the Primary Breast Tumour
